column4: your question prompted me to try plugging my digital camera into this Ubuntu machine, as soon as I plugged it in, it started up an Import photo's app even though I've not configured anything - that was with a Kodak Easyshare dx4330 camera - Thats more than windows did in autodetection :)
yes,but some cameras have a terrible usb support - those that come with a driver CD.
and the people that gave me this camera didn't know i used linux.
the only suggestion i'd have would be whats allready being suggested using a card reader - I have to do that to update the memeory card on my pocketpc
